triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper introduces the ETAPE corpus, a new dataset for linguistic research in speech-based TV content processing.

triples.name: Speech recognition
triples.relevance: Speech recognition is the core task that the ETAPE corpus is designed to evaluate for French-language TV content.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP techniques are applied to process and evaluate the TV content in the ETAPE corpus.
